# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. With its exceptional features and capabilities, it's truly a game-changer in its field. I believe it could significantly enhance your daily operations or personal use. Considering its quality and benefits, I'm extending an exclusive offer to you for $180. This is an opportunity to secure a high-value item at a competitive price. Let me know if you're interested in discussing further or if you have any questions about the product. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $180. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $180
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $80
